item.title: Crown of the Ivy Lord
item.description: A thorned wreath which gives the wearer supreme power over the woodlands and potency of nature. Plant creatures you create or control add your level to their hit points and proficiency to damage rolls Resistance to poison At the start of each round can expend a Hit Die to heal yourself Once per day can attempt to command a plant creature Gain the benefits of Sanctuary in relation to plants and animals at the start of each day .

item.title: Bleeding Heart
item.description: An amulet made from a still living human heart wrapped through with ivy and thorns, used as the primary ritual focus for the Circle of the Thorn. allows participation in greater rituals, reduces Essence cost by 3 can communicate with plant creatures and can expend a use of wild shape to attempt to turn plant creatures as a cleric turns undead casts Aid on to wearer every day as the heart beats .

item.title: Thornmail
item.description: Armor made of living thorns. Medium armor AC 15 + Dex (max 2). Can use reaction to deal 1d4 piercing damage to a melee attacker.

item.title: Circle of the Thorn
item.description: Circle of the Thorn The Circle of the Thorn is dedicated to the elimination of civilization, seeking to create a vast world-spanning wilderness and return all things to a primal nature.
